fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Attack or Defend a player each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You gain Ki everytime someone dies.
- You may use Ki to increase your attack or defence stat by 1-tier for that phase, this can stack.
- When you Defend a player, you will share your defence stat with them for one night.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who oppose the adventurers.
